comment1: Inactive alerts will not be shown.
comment2: You can use markdown, like _this_, **this**, or [this](https://pokeapi.co).
comment3: Possible levels are 'info', 'important' and 'success'. The default is 'info'.

message: **Notice:** Support for PokéAPI version 1 ended on 15 October 2018. [Read more...](/docs/v1.html)
**Outage Alert:** Pagination with `offset`/`limit` for PokéAPI v2 is temporarily broken. [Read more...](https://github.com/PokeAPI/pokeapi/issues/372)
**Notice:** PokéAPI v2 is back up and the migration to static hosting is complete. It is now much faster and more reliable.
